subheading: MyEtherWallet (our friends call us MEW) is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the Ethereum blockchain. Generate wallets, work with contracts, and so much more on our easy to use, open-source platform. How do you MEW?
obtainAddress: To obtain ETH address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: Send Ethereum and tokens, swap coins, purchase domains, deploy contracts, and more! This is where the magic happens!
aboutSubheading: MyEtherWallet - please, call us MEW - puts the Ethereum blockchain at your fingertips. We are a team of crypto-enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your ETH and ERC-20 tokens. We're always here to help, and we're never giving away ETH. Cheers!
aboutMewWalletDesc: Access the Ethereum blockchain's original and most-trusted wallet client, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant, easy-to-use interface.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: MEW supports all major hardware wallets including Ledger, Trezor, Digital Bitbox, Secalot, and many more.
aboutSwapDesc: MEW has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, ETH and BTC, ETH and ERC-20.
aboutMewConnectDesc: MEW's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android device, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
faqsSubheading: Have not found the question that you are looking for?
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
